titleStmt.title: A declaration of the causes moouing the Queene of England to giue aide to the defence of the people afflicted and oppressed in the lowe countries
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Richmount the first of October, 1585.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A.j.".
"An addition to the declaration: touching the slaunders published of her Maiestie" has separate pagination; register is continuous.
B and C outer formes are reimposed from STC 9189.
In this edition A3r line 11 of text ends "GOD"; B2r line 7 ends "compassi-".
Identified as STC 9188 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
